description.value:
You have reached heights of power equaling Razmir himself. You can Craft your @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Razmiri Mask] out of porcelain laced with precious metals, or upgrade your existing mask to a porcelain one in the same time it takes to Craft one made of iron. A @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Razmiri Mask (Porcelain)]{Porcelain Razmiri Mask} grants a +4 item bonus to Deception checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Lie] or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Feint], is an 18th-level item, and is an apex item that increases your Charisma modifier by 1 or increases it to +4, whichever would give you a higher score. It also gives you the following activation in addition to those granted by the standard, silver, and gold masks.

Activateâ€”Power of the Living God 1 (concentrate, manipulate, occult)

Frequency once per day

Effect You demand power from the world, using your mask as a locus to force reality to bend to your will. You cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Manifestation] as a 10th-rank occult spell, but no matter what spell you emulate with it, that spell has the incapacitation trait.
